FuncDef:
The default-cost command sets the default cost for imported routes.
The undo default-cost command sets the default cost to 0 for imported routes. The default-cost command sets the default cost for imported routes. The undo default-cost command sets the default cost to 0 for imported routes. By default, the cost for imported routes is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the default cost for imported routes.
The value is an integer in the range 0 to 15.
